biotools.summary: Sift-PUL database is a public repository providing predicted PULs with specific functional annotations. The key difference between sift-PUL and other PUL databases (e.g. PULDB, CGCs and dbCAN-PUL) is the functional annotation for each predicted PUL.

bioschemas.name: Sift-PUL
bioschemas.summary: Sift-PUL database is a public repository providing predicted PULs with specific functional annotations. The key difference between sift-PUL and other PUL databases (e.g. PULDB, CGCs and dbCAN-PUL) is the functional annotation for each predicted PUL.
